author: Matthew Fox
title: Zoom jumps 11% after company announces it added 100 million new users in 3 weeks (ZM)
description:
• Zoom Video Communications jumped 11% in Thursday trading after the company announced it surpassed 300 million daily users on its platform.
  • On April 1, Zoom announced it had exceeded 200 million daily users. That's an increase of 100 million …
